languages.text: "Байка местная. Мол, бродит мужик по нижним палубам да помогает беднякам, что сами себе на жизнь заработать не могут, да за слабых перед офицерами и блюстителями заступается. Да только сказка она и есть".

"Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."
languages.original_text: "Байка местная. Мол, бродит мужик по нижним палубам да помогает беднякам, что сами себе на жизнь заработать не могут, да за слабых перед офицерами и блюстителями заступается. Да только сказка она и есть".

traits.locale_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't make a living for themselves, and standing up for the weak against officers and enforcers. Except he's a story and nothing more."

"Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't make a living for themselves, and standing up for the weak against officers and enforcers. Except he's a story and nothing more."

"Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."

languages.text: «Es una historia que se cuenta por aquí. Dicen que hay un tío que va por las cubiertas inferiores ayudando a los pobres que no pueden ganarse la vida y enfrentándose a los oficiales y guardias para defender a los débiles. Pero, lógicamente, no es más que un cuento».
languages.original_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."

traits.locale_text: «Es una historia que se cuenta por aquí. Dicen que hay un tío que va por las cubiertas inferiores ayudando a los pobres que no pueden ganarse la vida y enfrentándose a los oficiales y guardias para defender a los débiles. Pero, lógicamente, no es más que un cuento».

languages.text: 「このあたりで語られてる話さ。下層デッキをうろつき回り、自分で生計を立てられない貧しい者たちを助け、弱者を守るべく士官やエンフォーサーに立ち向かっている男がいる。ただ、そいつはただの物語であって、それ以上の何者でもない」
languages.original_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."

traits.locale_text: 「このあたりで語られてる話さ。下層デッキをうろつき回り、自分で生計を立てられない貧しい者たちを助け、弱者を守るべく士官やエンフォーサーに立ち向かっている男がいる。ただ、そいつはただの物語であって、それ以上の何者でもない」

languages.text: “只不过是人们口耳相传的故事罢了。大家都说，这个家伙在底层甲板上到处游荡，帮助那些无法谋生的穷人，说这家伙会在军官和执法者面前挺身而出，捍卫弱者。然而，这只不过是个传说故事而已。”
languages.original_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."

traits.locale_text: “只不过是人们口耳相传的故事罢了。大家都说，这个家伙在底层甲板上到处游荡，帮助那些无法谋生的穷人，说这家伙会在军官和执法者面前挺身而出，捍卫弱者。然而，这只不过是个传说故事而已。”

languages.text: "Nur eine Geschichte, die man sich hier erzählt. Da soll dieser Typ auf den unteren Decks umherwandern und den Armen helfen, die sich ihren Unterhalt nicht selbst verdienen können. Angeblich begehrt er sogar gegen Offiziere und Enforcers auf, um die Schwachen zu verteidigen. Aber in Wahrheit ist er eben nur eine Geschichte, sonst nichts."
languages.original_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."

traits.locale_text: "Nur eine Geschichte, die man sich hier erzählt. Da soll dieser Typ auf den unteren Decks umherwandern und den Armen helfen, die sich ihren Unterhalt nicht selbst verdienen können. Angeblich begehrt er sogar gegen Offiziere und Enforcers auf, um die Schwachen zu verteidigen. Aber in Wahrheit ist er eben nur eine Geschichte, sonst nichts."

languages.text: « Bah, c'est rien de plus qu'un conte de bonne femme. On raconte qu'un gars viendrait en aide aux malheureux des ponts inférieurs qui peuvent pas gagner leur vie, et qu'il défendrait les faibles contre les officiers et les prévôts. Sauf que c'est rien de plus qu'une légende. »
languages.original_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."

traits.locale_text: « Bah, c'est rien de plus qu'un conte de bonne femme. On raconte qu'un gars viendrait en aide aux malheureux des ponts inférieurs qui peuvent pas gagner leur vie, et qu'il défendrait les faibles contre les officiers et les prévôts. Sauf que c'est rien de plus qu'une légende. »

languages.text: "Buralarda anlatılagelen bir hikâye. Alt güvertelerde gezip geçimini sağlayamayan yoksullara yardım eden ve güçsüzü savunmak için subaylarla infazcılara kafa tutan bir delikanlı olduğunu anlatırlar. Ancak o delikanlı, yalnızca bir hikâyeden ibarettir."
languages.original_text: "Just a story they tell around here. There's this chap they say wanders the lower decks helping the poor who can't earn a living for themselves, and standing up to the officers and enforcers in defence of the weak. Except he's just a story and nothing more."
